name: Slide Block Puzzle
description:
How to play?

1. Slide and move the block right or left.

2. The block has no support point, if there is no block below it, it will fall down.

3. Destroy Blocks by making full horizontal lines.

4. Destroying in a row will earn you extra points.

5. If your block reaches the top of the grid, it's game over.

6. You can use the tools that will help you at the points where you are stuck.

7. Supports three different game types: normal, arcade and timed game mode.

This game is free to play. You can enjoy the world of floating block puzzle games anytime, anywhere.

Download this block puzzle game now! Thanks in advance for playing!

The language support of this game is '한국어', 'English', '日本語', '中文 简体', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Русский', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'.
